page.title: 05RECREATION
page.content: The Newton Abbot area is well served in some ways but poor in others. We are very lucky to have areas of{open {space}and woods in which both children and adults can get out into the open air, play games, follow {nature trails}and see{wildlife}and {plants.}On the other hand children always complain that there isn't enough for them to do in the area, especially when they get into their 'teen's and have to travel to surrounding towns to find entertainment. For adults there are many groups to join and many activities to follow but some complain about the lack of larger town entertainment such as the theatre or ballet.The{Dyrons Centre}is used to provide both sporting and entertainment for young and old alike.
